verses.name: Acts 18:8
verses.text: And Crispus, the chief ruler of the synagogue, believed on the Lord with all his house; and many of the Corinthians hearing believed, and were baptized.

verses.name: Acts 18:9
verses.text: Then spake the Lord to Paul in the night by a vision, Be not afraid, but speak, and hold not thy peace:

verses.name: Acts 18:10
verses.text: For I am with thee, and no man shall set on thee to hurt thee: for I have much people in this city.

verses.name: Acts 18:11
verses.text: And he continued there a year and six months, teaching the word of God among them.
